lines.text: Never date a woman who pays her rent in singles.
You know what they say about cello players- they like to do it in a chair with their legs spread wide.
Ma'am, we have a dog in our presence!
I found him down by the pier.
Oh you bad dog! I should spank you.
Ooh, hey, I was down by the pier too.
And isn't it great how that works out for you. 'Cause it really could have gone either way.

[Ubermann hangs up the phone]
Never have I seen anyone kiss ass like that.
I know I'm no Neil Diamond, but happy birthday anyway.
Remember what I said about conquering your fears up here? I was wrong. This place would scare me shitless! Look at all those seats!
